command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/b/d/b/dataset_bdbf012f-650c-4f32-8e4d-a5c47f904181.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&        bcftools call  -m --prior 0.0011        --regions-overlap 1           --variants-only    --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/2/f/a/dataset_2fa30b2d-170c-4e70-a2f3-ebc2d6b1f3e3.dat'

params.sec_input_output: {"format_fields": "", "group_samples": false, "keep_alts": false, "keep_masked_ref": false, "output_tags": null, "skip_variants": null, "variants_only": true}
